file_content.text: Good to see you again.
I almost feel sorry for the Imps. When I asked you to help, I didn't know what I was throwing at them.
And word is, you even took down Lord Tharsis. I don't know whether to shake your hand or run for cover.
Word is you even took down Lord Tharsis. I don't know whether to start shaking hands or running for cover.
Thank you. For everyone you saved, I... I was wrong about you. It's good to see you really care about saving Balmorra.
As a Jedi, it's my duty to protect those in danger. I could never turn my back on Balmorra.
The Jedi care for all in need.
Duty or not, we do appreciate it.
Once Tai's request for Republic membership is approved, entire armies will protect your people.
Tai Cordan will do even more.
Gabe Dovaro, Republic citizen. That'll take some getting used to.
We're all in this war together. I wouldn't abandon Balmorra to the Empire's mercy.
Of course I care.
I know, it's just... the occupation's over. It's hard to believe.
If you start handing out the praise that fast, Gabe, it'll go to my head.
Careful, I blush easily.
Good point. I don't want to start thinking you're alright.
It was nothing.
Don't celebrate yet--there's still Imperial stragglers to handle.
The fighting's not quite over.
We'll see every Imperial soldier thrown offworld, I promise you. Maybe share a few of our tricks with the Republic military.
Here, take this with you. You've more than earned it. Whatever happens, you'll always have friends on Balmorra.
The action's in Moraine Territory, not here. Talk to Wixx.
Wait--you. You're the ones everyone's talking about. They're saying you put a real dent in the Imperials.
Hold up. You're that Jedi, right? The one who swiped the Empire's juiciest tech from under its nose?
Wait. You. You're the one who assassinated Darth Lachris, aren't you?
Hold up, soldier. I know you. You and Vik did a real number on the Imperials, didn't you?
Wait a second, I know you. I hear the Imperials are short a whole shipment of weapons, thanks to you.
Hang on, I know you. I hear you've been putting Imperials in their place.
I'm resistance. Came for help--funny that I run into you. You have no idea what you've stirred up.
The Empire's not taking defeat lying down. And we're the ones in the firing line.
The resistance was a great help in securing the cloaking device. I apologize if my actions put you at risk.
I'm sorry you're in danger.
No one thought resisting the Empire would be a piece of cake, but the Imperials have been pushed to the brink.
We removed Darth Lachris to stop the Balmorran people's suffering.
I didn't mean to endanger you.
Nobody's shedding tears for that tyrant. But if you don't help us, it'll have been for nothing.
The resistance put its neck on the line for me and Vik. Tell me how to make this right.
Then I want to help.
I busted Camp Vigil wide open and tossed the Empire's weapons offworld. What's it going to take?
The Imperials just don't quit.
The Empire didn't get where it is by rolling over easy, especially when a spacer makes it look bad.
What "firing line"?
The Empire wants to destroy the resistance. It doesn't need our actions as an excuse.
Don't blame us for that.
True. But you rattled their cage... so maybe you can put the Imperial occupation down for good.
The Empire wants to destroy the resistance. It doesn't need my actions as an excuse.
Don't blame me for that.
True. But you rattled their cage... so maybe you can put the Imperial occupation down for good.
The Empire's attacking Moraine Territory. That's where the resistance started; mostly villages and factories.
Moraine Territory's also where we hid our families. But now the Imps have found them. Hundreds... hundreds are already dead.
The Imperials are trying to break your will. I'll run them out of Moraine Territory first.
Unacceptable. Let me help.
I will stand between your families and the Imperial forces.
This cannot continue.
You tell me how to get to Moraine Territory, and I'll teach the Empire some manners.
Let me handle the Imperials.
How did the Empire cause so much damage? Wasn't Moraine Territory protected?
Weren't there any defenses?
We didn't want to get the Empire's attention with a big defense network. Stupid, in hindsight.
You're the resistance. Resist.
You can't be--half the reason the Empire's so desperate is because of what you did! How can you walk?
If my actions drove the Imperials to attack, it's only fair that I try to stop them.
You're right, I can't. Sorry.
I suppose I could help....
This whole area's a war zone, but you should have a clear path to Moraine Outpost--it's our oldest staging ground.
When you get there, talk to Wixx. If she's still alive, she'll be fighting. Good luck.
Very easily. [Refuse quest]
Fine. Maybe we'll meet again, if there's still a Balmorra for you to come back to.
When the Empire's gone, we'll pull those red banners out of Sobrik and have ourselves a bonfire.
